EmailTemplate.description: Alerts shipping contact of Tracking Number for Supplies Case
EmailTemplate.name: Case: Tracking Number
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Guardant Health Supplies have been shipped
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
This is to notify you that your supplies have been shipped for {!Case.Account}.
Tracking #: {!Case.Tracking_Number__c}
Protocol # (if applicable): {!Account.Protocol__c}
Please feel free to reach out to us if you have any questions or concerns.
Best Regards,
Guardant Health Client Services
(855) 698-8887 Opt 1
